english.segment1: you try to cross the universe. I'm in the way, I fill it. that satallite your longing for. revolves because I will it. and man, I know your story. but I never watch tv..
english.segment2: CHORUS. that city blue that you once knew. means all the world to me
english.segment3: the vacuum you percieved so small. is really never-ending. you would have known if you'd recall. the message I've been sending. and man, I know your story. but my heart just breaks in three..
english.segment4: CHORUS. the city blue that you once knew. means all the world to me.
